def tongues(code):
    vowels = 'aiyeou'
    consonants = 'bkxznhdcwgpvjqtsrlmf'
    translation = ''
    for char in code:
        if char in vowels:
            index = vowels.index(char)
            new_index = (index + 3) % len(vowels)
            translation += vowels[new_index]
        elif char in vowels.upper():
            index = vowels.upper().index(char)
            new_index = (index + 3) % len(vowels)
            translation += vowels.upper()[new_index]
        elif char in consonants:
            index = consonants.index(char)
            new_index = (index + 10) % len(consonants)
            translation += consonants[new_index]
        elif char in consonants.upper():
            index = consonants.upper().index(char)
            new_index = (index + 10) % len(consonants)
            translation += consonants.upper()[new_index]
        else:
            translation += char
    return translation
